title: >>> STAIRWAY to HEAVEN
body_text:
The announcement the world has awaited ...
In less than three months, the sport will reach its own "promised land", celebrating a phenomenal 100th event. And through the course of almost two years, there have been those who have stuck with the sport through its greatest triumphs and certainly toughest obstacles. For those elite superstars, they have an absolute once in a lifetime opportunity to headline the single, biggest dodgeball extravaganza of them all,
DODGEBALL 100
. Think of this as a special "thanks" for the hours, days, weeks, months, and even years of dedication, drive, and passion. Your participation will be rewarded.
*The following players
must
attend DODGEBALL 90 for a chance to become one of the captains at DODGEBALL 100.
1.
John Tronolone
2.
Diana DiBuccio
3.
Chris Adams
4.
Kevin Adams
5.
Justin Pierce
6.
Mike "Sputz" Krott
7.
Tom Adams
8.
Kevin Fitzpatrick
9.
Kevin Megill
10.
Steve Adams
These are the players who have participated in the most number of events from DAY 1 to DODGEBALL 89. Congratulations are certainly in order and are again thanked for all of their hardwork and commitment, turning what was a small, two hour gathering eons ago to a beloved sport, one of competition, excitement, and friends.
So again, if you made it onto the Top Ten list and would like the chance to headline DODGEBALL 100, come to DODGEBALL 90 on June 2 for this golden opportunity. For those that did not make the list, do not fear. There is plenty more regarding the milestone summer event, DODGEBALL 100.
...................
And of course don't forget about the titantic clash of icons:
Justin Pierce vs. Tom Adams
this Saturday night.
Stayed tuned to
dodgeball.livejournal.com
for the official preview on this blockbuster.
body_html:
The announcement the world has awaited ...


In less than three months, the sport will reach its own "promised land", celebrating a phenomenal 100th event. And through the course of almost two years, there have been those who have stuck with the sport through its greatest triumphs and certainly toughest obstacles. For those elite superstars, they have an absolute once in a lifetime opportunity to headline the single, biggest dodgeball extravaganza of them all, DODGEBALL 100. Think of this as a special "thanks" for the hours, days, weeks, months, and even years of dedication, drive, and passion. Your participation will be rewarded.

*The following players must attend DODGEBALL 90 for a chance to become one of the captains at DODGEBALL 100.

1. John Tronolone
2. Diana DiBuccio
3. Chris Adams
4. Kevin Adams
5. Justin Pierce
6. Mike "Sputz" Krott
7. Tom Adams
8. Kevin Fitzpatrick
9. Kevin Megill
10. Steve Adams

These are the players who have participated in the most number of events from DAY 1 to DODGEBALL 89. Congratulations are certainly in order and are again thanked for all of their hardwork and commitment, turning what was a small, two hour gathering eons ago to a beloved sport, one of competition, excitement, and friends.

So again, if you made it onto the Top Ten list and would like the chance to headline DODGEBALL 100, come to DODGEBALL 90 on June 2 for this golden opportunity. For those that did not make the list, do not fear. There is plenty more regarding the milestone summer event, DODGEBALL 100.

...................

And of course don't forget about the titantic clash of icons: Justin Pierce vs. Tom Adams this Saturday night.
Stayed tuned to dodgeball.livejournal.com for the official preview on this blockbuster.
